701188f-a.title: Bronx: Grand Concourse - 204th Street (East)
701188f-a.text:
3045 Grand Concourse, adjoining the S.W. corner of East 204th
Street, showing the Cappa Court.
About 1928.
General Photographic Company.

701190f-a.title: Bronx: Grand Concourse - 204th Street (East)
701190f-a.text:
Grand Concourse, east side, north from E. 204th to
E. 205th Streets.
May 5, 1938.
P.L. Sperr

700318f-a.title: Bronx: 204th Street (East) - Grand Concourse
700318f-a.text:
2O1 E. 204th Street, at the N.E. corner of Grand Concourse, showing an old frame house below the street grade.
ay 5, 1938.
P.L. Sperr

700319f-a.title: Bronx: 204th Street (East) - Grand Concourse
700319f-a.text:
(1)
203 E. 204th Street, adjoining the N.E. corner of Grand Concourse, showing an old gabled house below the street grade.
May 6, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
A view of the house at a later date, looking eastward.
May 5, 1938.
P. L. Sperr.

700320f-a.title: Bronx: 204th Street (East) - Grand Concourse
700320f-a.text:
(1)
203 E. 204th Street, adjoining the N.E. corner of Grand Concourse, showing an old gabled house below the street grade.
May 8, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
A view of the house at a later date, looking eastward.
May 5, 1938.
P. L. Sperr.

700321f-a.title: Bronx: 204th Street (East) - Grand Concourse
700321f-a.text:
225 E. 204th Street, north side, between Grand Woncourse und Valentine Avenue, showing an old frame house standing below the street grade. This house does not actually bear No. 225. It stands 82 feet back of the street, directly behind a 3 story brick building bearinn the above street number. Che view is north. eastward from the elevated level of E. 2O4t Street.
N8y 5, 1938.
P.L. Sperr
